list_definition.definition: not taking sides in a quarrel or war

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A neutral country was asked to help settle the dispute.

list_definition.definition: (in electricity) neither positively nor negatively charged

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: the neutral wire in a plug.

list_definition.definition: (a person belonging to) a nation that takes no part in a war or quarrel

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Switzerland remained a neutral during the conflict.

list_definition.definition: the position of the gear of an engine in which no power passes to the wheels etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I put the car into neutral.
